@(service: akka.grpc.gen.scaladsl.Service)

@akka.grpc.gen.Constants.DoNotEditComment
package @service.packageName

import akka.grpc.scaladsl.Metadata

/*
 * Generated by Akka gRPC. DO NOT EDIT.
 */
trait @{service.name}PowerApi {
  @for(method <- service.methods) {
  def @{method.nameSafe}(in: @method.parameterType, metadata: Metadata): @method.returnType
  }

@if(service.filterApi) {
  @for(method <- service.methods) {
  val @{method.name}Filter: Seq[@{service.name}FilterPowerApi.GenericFilter[@method.parameterType, @method.returnType]] = Nil
  }
}
}
